net.jxta.impl.cm
Class CacheUtils

java.lang.Object
  net.jxta.impl.cm.CacheUtils

public class CacheUtils
extends Object

Collection of utility methods useful to AdvertisementCache implementations, extracted from the original CacheManager implementation.

Method Detail

getIndexfields

public static Map<String,String> getIndexfields(String[] fields,
                                                StructuredDocument<?> doc)
Extracts the values for all indexable fields in an advertisement.

Parameters:
fields - the names of the indexable fields, typically provided by Advertisement.getIndexFields().
doc - the document of the advertisement.
Returns:
a map of all indexable fields to their values in the provided advertisement document.
